dm:bugtracker.dm:product: SUSE Enterprise Storage Implementation Guide for Veeam Backup & Replication

productname: SUSE Enterprise Storage 5.5, Veeam Backup & Replication 9.5

abstract.para: This guide provides instructions how to implement SUSE Enterprise Storage 5.5 with Veeam Backup & Replication as both a Linux Repository and an S3 target as part of a Scale Out Backup Repository.
